title: Architects and engineers are turning old shipping containers into mobiled ICUs
description: To help alleviate ICU space shortages, an open-source design is allowing builders around the world to convert shipping containers into negative pressure care units.
content:
A group of architects and engineers is working to convert shipping containers into intensive care units to help hospitals that are running low on space for COVID-19 patients.
The open-source project, dubbed Connected Units for Respiratory Ailments (CURA, or … [+3268 chars]
